description: TURDY CONSTRUCTION - 290KG weight capacity home gym bench has solid mechanics design. The wide base enlarges the bearing capacity area and the base cap is anti-skid to prevent any movement during the exercise. It is incredible stability to promise true safety and avoid any wobbleFULL-BODY EXERCISE - We have a highly effective utility exercise bench. It gives you a spot to take the different exercises for the full body such as dumbbell press, lift, and row, sit up, crunches, concentration curls, reverse flies and more. Then the user can increase target specific muscle strength in the chest, arms, shoulders, back, and AbsThis home gym fitness bench is an approved productADVANCED MATERIALS - The flat bench works well both in home gym and commercial use. The main frame is made of a thickened layer pad and the heavy-duty steel. The leather board is filled with high-density foam which offers comfortable exercise and the steel tube makes this weight bench sturdy support for the toughest workouts  SUS Products Flat Weight Bench- 290 kg Capacity Utility Exercise Bench for Weight Strength Training, Sit Up Abs Fitness Bench for Full Body Workout of Home Gym
